en: Do not forget to click on the 'Calculate' button!
Expanded BE limits are only allowed for replicate design with CV intra > 0.3
Enter label and size for each treatment arm. Missing labels are ignored
Do not forget to click on the "Randomize" button!
Preview Randomization table (up to first 50 records)
block size is not a multiple of %s.
At least one arm size is not correct. Arm size should be an integer value greater than or equal to %s.
Number of subjects should be an integer value greater than one, e.g. %s.
Failed to create a valid randomization list.
Non-missing arm labels must be unique
